2021 - Present
Data Analyst/Scientist
Zest Wealth Management
Lyndhurst, NJ

What started as a "pandemic side sig", on November 19, 2021, me and a team of three officially founded Zest Wealth Management.

As an absolute return fund, Zest specializes in protecting its customers' capitals and helping individuals and organizations make smart financial choices through proprietary trading and investing strategies.

Zest is transforming the Information Technology, Hospitality, and Real Estate landscape in the emerging economies of India and Nepal.

Learn more...

2019 - 2023
Math and Computer Science Educator
Multiple High Schools
Newark, NJ and Washington, DC

Upon graduating from Ramapo College, I had the privilege of running data-driven instruction across two high schools in Newark, NJ, and Washington, DC.

I have not only taught in online, hybrid, and in-person classrooms but also served as a dedicated Coach for 50+ students, helping them achieve their college and career goals.

I have enjoyed designing and implementing rigorous and accessible curriculums for Geometry, Pre-calculus, AP Computer Science Principles, and AP Computer Science A courses.

Education

2023 - 2024
Georgia Institute of Technology
Atlanta, GA
Master of Science
Computational Data Analytics

Member of the Data Science @ GT Club

Member of the Association for Computing Machinery

Specialization Courses: Analytics Modeling, Regression Analysis, Data and Visual Analytics, Digital Marketing Analytics

What do I do at Georgia Tech?

  • Work with large and messy datasets
  • Figure out which machine learning model is appropriate for a given problem
  • Write complex SQL queries and understand the best practices for designing a database
  • Learn new technologies, such as PySpark, as well as how to pick up new technologies quickly, which is critical as the data science world is always changing
  • Improve debugging and coding skills in Python and R
  • Understand the mathematics behind various machine learning algorithms
  • Solve challenging optimization problems, such as the diet problem and supermarket sweep
  • Create a powerful data visualization or dashboard that tells a story
  • Understand the business context of a problem and present the analysis in a way that is relevant to the stakeholder
  • Meet wonderful friends and connections as I master the art of problem-solving

2015 - 2019
Ramapo College
Mahwah, NJ
Bachelor of Science
Mathematics

Minors in Computer Science and Economics.

Recipient of the most prestigious merit-based Presidential Scholarship for all 8 semesters of college that covered full tuition and a housing grant.

Dean's List in 5 out of 8 semesters of full-time enrollment.

Served as the President of Ramapo Students For Liberty Chapter - the largest pro-liberty student organization in the world.

Some college projects:

    Out of Gas and Driving on E (for electric, not empty): Analyzed Electric Vehicles' long-term viability as a replacement for combustion engine cars, earning an Honorable Mention in the Interdisciplinary Contest in Modeling.
    Goals Define Games: Performed an in-depth statistical analysis of goal-scoring dynamics among the 40 English Premier League and La Liga teams in the 2019-2020 season, correctly predicting the tournament Champions and 5 out of 6 relegated teams.
